page.title: 07The Country Hotel, St. Mary
page.content: Mr. Le Gresley owns the St. Mary's Country Hotel. It plays an important part in the community for social life. His day starts at 8.3O a.m. and finishes at 11.OO p.m. At 9.OO the barmaid gets everything they need ready. The chef starts cooking the lunch at 12.OO carries on till 2.OO. During that time about 15O-2OO people eat there. After that everyone cleans up. After 5.OO hardly anybody comes in. Then at 7.OO-8.3O the chef cooks again for the evening meals. After that teenagers arrive. The pub has many locals. On an island pubs will always be in demand. The hotel has lots of activities; on Mondays it has darts. On Tuesdays there is crib. On Wednesdays there is pool. On Thursday there is Ladies darts and finally on Sundays there is football and shooting.
